name: Drawing Application
desc: Using a combination of variables, images, for loops, animations, conditional statements, text, color, etc. create a “Drawing Application” that uses keyboard and mouse user input. Must include at least one for loop and two conditional statement.

name: Bubbles Example
desc: Starting from the class example of using arrays, I created a small app that makes bubbles move toward the mouse on click. This is also an example of using the instance mode for p5.js.
